sessions.title: Keynote
sessions.description: Explores the unification of lakehouse architecture with generative AI, highlighting innovations in AI, data warehousing, and analytics on the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform.

sessions.title: Get Started with Generative AI
sessions.description: Teaches how to build GenAI applications using Databricks, covering prompt engineering, MLflow, Mosaic AI, and governance concepts.

sessions.title: AI/BI Genie - Intro & Best Practices
sessions.description: Explores best practices for empowering teams with self-service data analytics and visualization.

sessions.title: Getting Started with Databricks SQL: Live Demos and New Feature
sessions.description: Demonstrates Databricks SQL features, including AI assistants for coding and dashboards, and serverless infrastructure optimizations.

sessions.title: How Kestra Holdings Invests in Data Trust with Data Observability
sessions.description: Showcases Kestra Holdings' approach to data quality using Databricks Unity Catalog and Monte Carlo for data observability.

sessions.title: Discover Unity Catalog: Your Guide to Governance for Data and AI
sessions.description: Presents Unity Catalog's latest features for data and AI governance, including row/column filtering, governed tags, and attribute-based access controls.

sessions.title: Exploring LLMOps on Databricks for Building Composable Compound AI Systems
sessions.description: Examines Large Language Model Operations architectures, including building RAG bots and agents on Databricks.

sessions.title: Get Started with Data Engineering with Databricks
sessions.description: Introduces basic data engineering skills using Databricks, covering data ingestion, transformation, and workflow orchestration.

sessions.title: The Unreasonable Effectiveness of an Asset Graph
sessions.description: Demonstrates how a global data lineage graph can answer critical questions in data platforms, focusing on Dagster and Databricks integration.

sessions.title: Building a Trusted Data Foundation for AI on Databricks
sessions.description: Showcases Qlik's integration with Databricks MosaicAI for automating real-time data pipelines and transforming source data.

sessions.title: Comprehensive Guide to Mosaic AI: Getting GenAI Apps to Production on Databricks
sessions.description: Explores Mosaic AI tools for rapid Generative AI application development, maintenance, and practical integration techniques.

sessions.title: Simplify Data, Analytics, and AI Orchestration with Databricks Workflows
sessions.description: Demonstrates latest capabilities of Databricks Workflows for orchestrating data, analytics, and AI tasks, including new control features and job scheduling improvements.

sessions.title: Boosting Rapid Innovation in Biotech with Novel Data Technology
sessions.description: Illustrates how Kythera Labs and Databricks drive efficiencies in life sciences and healthcare data management through innovative data technologies.

sessions.title: Data frenzy to data freedom: How centralized data fuels analytics & AI
sessions.description: Discusses how Fivetran and Databricks enable data centralization for analytics and AI, addressing challenges and showcasing real-world examples.
